page.title: 07LARKHILL SOILING FACTORY 1
page.content: Larkhill Soiling Factory was built in 1961.It is situated on the north side of Yeovil,just on the outskirts.It is owned by{Clarks,}who are the largest shoe makers in Europe.Larkhill makes Rubber and P.V.C.soling for Clarks Footwear.Clarks have many branchs all over England,New Zealand,Australia and America. Larkhill sells soling in the U.K. and also exports to the Middle East,South Africa,Australia and the Far East.The products are transported by road in the U.K. and exported by ship. They employ 140 people who all live within 15 miles of Yeovil.Many of the workers were born in Yeovil.The factory works three shifts; 6.00am_ 2.00pm,2.00pm_10.00pm,10.00pm_6.00am and the offices and laboratories work from 8.15am_5.00pm with one hour for lunch.
